```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)

data_file_path <- here('data', 'aggregate_data.csv')
agg_data <- read_csv(data_file_path)

agg_data |> 
  group_by(c_ind_cod_type) |>
  summarize(count = n())

agg_data |> 
  separate(c_ind_dod_ymd, into = c("dod_year", "dod_month", "dod_day"), sep = "-") |>
  group_by(c_system_abbr, dod_year) |> 
  summarize()
```
